Description.Text:
Property Location
Hotel Orquidea is centrally located in Santa Eulalia del Rio, walking distance from Puig de Missa and close to Punta Arabi Hippy Market. This family-friendly aparthotel is within the vicinity of Golf Club Ibiza and Las Dalias Hippy Market.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 196 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Your room comes with a memory foam bed, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don't miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a seasonal outdoor pool, and bicycles to rent. This aparthotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and an arcade/game room. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the aparthotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-out, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the aparthotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Hotel Orquidea is centrally located in Santa Eulalia del Rio, walking distance from Puig de Missa and close to Punta Arabi Hippy Market. This family-friendly aparthotel is within the vicinity of Golf Club Ibiza and Las Dalias Hippy Market.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Puig de Missa - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Punta Arabi Hippy Market - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Golf Club Ibiza - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Las Dalias Hippy Market - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Sa Torreta - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Marina Botafoch - 10.4 km / 6.5 mi
Sacred Heart of Jesus Statue - 10.4 km / 6.5 mi
San Rafael Racetrack - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi
Faro de Punta Grossa - 10.8 km / 6.7 mi
Port of Ibiza - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi
Sant Rafel Church - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi
Ibiza Museum of Contemporary Art - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi
Teatro Pereyra - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi
Archaeological Museum of Ibiza - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi
Ibiza Cathedral - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Orquidea is Ibiza (IBZ) - 18.3 km / 11.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
